hints.contactEmail: Where should people reach you with questions about the project?
hints.contactWebsite: URL to an external site where people can see more about your project.
hints.username: Enter your login user name. A good choice is firstname.lastname (i.e. john.doe)
hints.postalAddress: If someone sent you a letter, where would it be addressed?
hints.knowledgeArea: UNESCO Knowledge Area that best defines your project.
hints.knowledgeAreas: Select all knowledge areas of research under this structure.
hints.summary: Long-form project description. No character limit.
hints.description: Long-form description. No character limit. Markdown is available for styling
hints.descriptionTemplate: Please follow the prodived template and do not remove the section headers (Lines starting with '##'). Fill in your project specifics replacing the instructional lines.
hints.password: Your password must be at least 8 characters, not be a common password and not contain your username.
